boosterDaily: Because you are a booster, you have received double the normal rewards amount!
noItemProvided: Please specify an item from the shop to buy!
unknownColor:
Sorry, I don't recognize the color {color}.
Make sure you choose a proper color from \`+shop colors\`!
alreadyPurchasedRole: Hey, you've already purchased that role!
alreadyPurchasedColor: Hey, you've already purchased that color!
notEnoughCurrency: Sorry, you don't have enough {currency} for that!
channelPurchaseSuccess: You have purchased a private channel! You can edit your channel here: {channelLink}
bugNoArguments:
Please describe the bug properly.
Mention details of how the bug has occurred, for which role and in which game. Do mention details of expected and observed results.
If you have any screenshots to add, create a bug with above mentioned details. Then go to the URL generated and add your screenshots in the comments of the issue.
bugNoGameServer: Images attached to a bug from the game server cannot be submitted! Please use the link below to add your attachments.
bugSuccess:
The bug has successfully been reported! Please provide any screenshots or more information here:
{url}
suggestNoArguments:
Please describe the suggestion properly.
Mention details of how you want to improve current system / how your idea is effective and needs to be added in WOVSIM. Do mention the difference in current system and your idea if applicable.
If you have any screenshots / details to add, create an issue with above mentioned details. Then go to the URL generated and add your them in the comments of the suggestion.
suggestNoGameServer: Images attached to a suggestion from the game server cannot be submitted! Please use the link below to add your attachments.
suggestSuccess:
Your suggestion has been sent! Please provide any screenshots or more information here:
{url}
timeNoDuration: How long it should be? You forgot to state the duration.
specialRoleMissing: I am unable to find a special role assigned to you! If you have one, report this using `+bug`.
colorChanged: Done! Your special role color has been changed!
nameSuccess: Done! Your special role's name has been changed to {name}.
profileNeedToBuy: You need to buy the profile command in order to use it!
profileLocked: This player does not have their profile unlocked from the shop!
shopFooter: Use `+buy <color> role` to purchase a color.
noMentionPriv: Do not mention your private channel!
gameServerMaxLength: The maximum length for messages is {length} characters!
gameServerOneLine: You can only send one line per message!
pingMessage: Hey there, I'm {name}! My prefix is {prefix}, and you can use `${prefix}help` to see all my commands!
maintenance: Sorry, the bot is currently in maintenance mode!
blacklisted: You are blacklisted! You can no longer use any commands.
commandRestrictGameServer: That command can only be used in the game server!
error: An error occured when trying to execute this command. The developers have been notified.
languageChange: Your language has been set to {language}!
voteWhileDead: You are dead,  you can't vote.
spectateDead: Sorry, you're dead. You can't switch to a spectator now.
narrateSecondMini: Unfortunately, you aren't the host, and because you are a narrator in training, you aren't allowed to narrate spectate!
notNarrator: Sorry, you must be a narrator to do this!
gameBanned: You are game banned! You cannot join any games.
joinedLink: {ping}, use the link above to join the game!
alreadyJoined: You have already joined the game! Check {channel} for the link!
emergencyStop: Emergency stop initiated! Please contact a dev assistant immediately!
helpMain:
**__How to join a simulation game?__**
When a game is live, it will be announced in {gamewarning}. Click on the join game button to join a game server.
Read more about how to play in {howtoplay}. Ranked games will be announced in {rankedwarn}.

For any questions head over to {supportandquestions}.

Use following commands with {clientUser}'s prefix ({prefix}).
helpEconomy:
`shop` Buy different items in the shop.
`daily` Get coins, roses, items as a daily reward.
`inventory` Find the roses, coins, items in your inventory.
`balance` Check how many narrator bot coins you got.
`namechange` Give your custom role a new name.
`colorchange` Give your custom role a new color.
`profile` Check out your exclusive profile. Available in the shop!
`use` Use this command with the item name such as lootbox, icon to use them.
`rose` Give roses and bouquets during a game.
helpFun:
`emoji` use emojis from different servers available from `emojilist`.
`write` Write something with fancy letters and numbers.
`reverse` Reverse your sentences.
helpBot:
`settings` Customize your preferred language for the bot replies.
`botinfo` Get to know more about the bot.
`bug` Report a bug to the development team.
`suggest` Suggest an improvement or enhancement for Narrator Bot.
`roleinfo` Know more about the in-game roles and interactions.
dailyNotReady: You cannot claim your next daily prize yet! Come back {time}
